common.fallbackBanner: Showing contingency data due to a temporary API incident.

home.aboutIntro: I am a traveler and a true food enthusiast. This guide comes from years on the road, sitting at tables with curiosity, and keeping only the places that are truly worth recommending.
home.role1Desc: Recommendations come from real visits, not generic rankings or contextless lists.
home.role2Desc: Editorial filtering based on consistency, culinary identity, and real revisit value.
home.role3Desc: See rating and price first. Then specialty, curated comment, and location to act quickly.
home.projectSubtitle: A guide built in Gipuzkoa for people visiting it
home.projectText: This guide is curated by a local for visitors: less noise, more real context on neighborhoods, towns, and tables worth your time.
home.trajectorySubtitle: From travel notes to a living database
home.trajectoryText: It started as personal notes and evolved into structured data with stars, price, specialty, editorial comment, and map for each restaurant.
home.title: A curated guide to discover restaurants in Gipuzkoa
home.subtitle: I am local to Gipuzkoa, and this guide is designed for people visiting the region: clear recommendations to eat well from day one.
home.selectionSubtitle: Top picks based on rating, consistency, and real on-site experience.
home.principleTechniqueDesc: Solid execution, precise cooking, and personality.
home.principleConsistencyDesc: Steady level in kitchen, service, and dining room.
home.weeklySubtitle: Restaurants curated by Asier based on rating, consistency, and real experience.
home.categoriesSubtitle: Quickly find the cuisine style you want, with real counts by category.
home.errorHighlights: The curated selection could not be loaded.
home.signatureQuote: I do not only look for memorable dishes. I look for places you will want to revisit.
home.manifestoBody1: If you are visiting Gipuzkoa, this is your local compass: what is truly worth it in Donostia and across nearby towns.
home.manifestoBody2: Every recommendation comes from real local experience and is structured for fast decisions: stars, price, specialty, and area.
home.useGuideIntro: Think of this as your local companion: open, filter, and find where to eat in minutes based on your visit plan.
home.step1Desc: Adjust category, city, price, and minimum rating to match what you need today.
home.step2Desc: Start with stars and price, then check specialty and the curated comment.
home.step3Desc: Once it fits your plan, open the map and continue your route instantly.

category.label: Editorial selection
category.allDescription: All restaurants in a single view, with filters by category, city, price, and rating.
category.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, specialty, or city...
category.noResultsHint: Try clearing filters or changing the query.
category.endOfList: You reached the end of the selection.
category.ratingLegendIntro: The editorial scale goes from 1 to 3 and focuses on full experience: product, execution, and consistency.
category.ratingLegend3: Top tier: exceptional and highly consistent.
category.ratingLegend1: Correct or niche profile, pending broader validation.
category.ratingLegendNote: If a rating is missing, a provisional 3 is assigned on the 3/3 scale until editorial review.

hero.subtitle: The best gourmet recommendations in Gipuzkoa.
hero.description: Curated with local criteria and an editorial perspective.

about.title: About Asier
about.description1: shares gastronomic recommendations focused on product, technique, and overall experience.
about.description2: This guide brings together restaurants, categories, and emerging profiles to discover Gipuzkoa through an editorial lens.
about.quote: Great dining is also about understanding the territory and its people.

talents.title: Young talents shaping the next chapter of gastronomy
talents.subtitle: Rising profiles in kitchen, service, wine, and innovation that Asier considers key to follow the local scene.
talents.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, company, or role...
talents.noResults: No talents found for current filters.
talents.spotlightText: A selection to discover who is raising the gastronomic standard.
talents.curationNote: Profiles are highlighted for vision, execution, and real ability to elevate the dining experience.
